Company OverviewCohere Health is illuminating healthcare for patients, their doctors, and all those who are important in a patient’s healthcare experience, both in and out of the doctors office. Founded in August, 2019, we are committed to eliminating wasteful friction patients and doctors experience in areas that have nothing to do with health and treatment, particularly for diagnoses that require expensive procedures or medications. To that end, we build software that is expressly designed to ensure the appropriate plan of care is understood and expeditiously approved, so that patients and doctors can focus on health, rather than payment or administrative hassles.Opportunity OverviewAt Cohere Health our Machine Learning Team is focused on using unstructured clinical documents to automate and augment the prior authorization process. We do this through a combination of traditional machine learning techniques and new approaches. The team is responsible for all parts of the machine learning process, from solution design and model building to deployment and model evaluation.Last but not least: People who succeed here are empathetic teammates who are candid, kind, caring, and embody our core values and principles. We believe that diverse, inclusive teams make the most impactful work. Cohere is deeply invested in ensuring that we have a supportive, growth-oriented environment that works for everyone.What You Will DoProvide mentorship, coaching and guidance to a team of 4-5 Machine Learning EngineersLead by example: writing and reviewing modular code and guiding team members in best software engineering practicesBuild reliable and scalable production machine learning systems on AWSEstablish goals, deliverables and timelines for Machine Learning ProjectsBreak large ambiguous projects into smaller tractable deliverablesCoordinate and build strong partnerships with Data Science, Product Management, Data Engineering, Application Engineering, DevOps, and Clinical teams to deliver innovative high quality Machine Learning ModelsHelp grow the ML team by interviewing candidatesBe a key contributor to the strategies and goals of the Machine Learning TeamYour Background & RequirementsExperience leading machine learning projects from inception to deploymentExperience coaching and mentoring machine learning engineers3+ years experience in applied ML in the industry with a degree or higher (MS/PhD) in computer science, machine learning, mathematics or similar fieldClear understanding of model building, model maintenance and the measures that optimize models for product useUnderstand experimental design and can independently perform collection, measurement, and interpretation of resultsExpert in Python and pySparkExperienced in various regression and classification approachesHands on experience building NLP models, using a variety of techniquesExperience working with healthcare data, ElasticSearch, OCR or graphsExperience with AWS and DockerWe can’t wait to learn more about you and meet you at Cohere Health!Equal Opportunity Statement Cohere Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to fostering an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all. To us, it’s personal.#BI-Remote
